extendedInfo.description: "This is a great app for Yosemite National Park." - Mike Tollefson, President, Yosemite Conservancy"Chimani's National Parks apps are a worthwhile addition to your smartphone." - Casey Schreiner, ModernHiker.comOver 300+ unique points of interest (POIs) throughout Yosemite National Park. A 45+ minute audio/auto tour, GPS-enabled/custom-made mapÂ which works WITHOUT a cell/wifi connection, daily Ranger-Led events schedule, sunrise/sunsets data for over a year, free shuttle bus schedule andÂ route map, 150+ photographs, 30+ hiking trail descriptions, scenic viewpoint guide, a special Safety section, and details on camping, lodging, dining, museums, stores, restrooms, parking, swimming, picnicking, and bicycling. RICH CONTENT: + Content has been written by a professional travel writer - not copy-and-pasted from the Park Service website! + Over 150 professional photographs of park.+ Descriptions for 30 of the most popular hiking trails with the park. + Unique Safety section which details all the concerns while visiting the park. + Location and description of EVERY restroom in the park! + Location and description of EVERY parking lot in the park! + Location and description of EVERY picnic area lot in the park! + Details on lodging, stores, camping and dining options throughout the park! MAPS: + NO CELL/WIFI CONNECTION REQUIRED! Download all the maps for offline usage.+ High resolution, topographic maps which you can edit!+ Carriage roads intersection labels.+ Hiking trails for the entire park.+ Interactive map annotations.Â  + GPS "where am I" function for the entire Park (does not work on non-GPS enabled devices such as the iPod Touch) Â  AUDIO/AUTO TOUR: + 45 minute audio tour by a professional voiceover artist.Â  + 47 points of interest located in the Yosemite Valley, Glacier Point Road, Tioga Road, and Wawona area. RANGER-LED EVENTS SCHEDULE: + Daily National Park Service Ranger-led events are pre-loaded and updated automatically.+ Includes the time, optional fees, accessibility, meeting location, and description. + View multiple days of events.+ Updated on a regular basis.SHUTTLE BUS SCHEDULE:* Complete FREE shuttle bus schedule.* Stop locations and times.* Simple, easy to read "Next Bus Arrives" interface.SUNRISE/SUNSET: + Sunrise and sunset data for seven of the best locations in the park + View any date within 365 days into the future + Updated on a regular basis INTERFACE: + Universal National Park Service symbols. + Search all content within the app.+ Favorites feature.PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: + Push notifications for park-related news, alerts, and events.+ Push notifications as soon as they are available.For more details on this and other Chimani apps for the national parks, visit www.chimani.com. Be sure to follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/chimani and Facebook at www.facebook.com/chimaniAndroid Permissions Request ExplanationFor human readable explanations on why this Chimani app is requesting various permissions on your device, please refer to our privacy policy at http://www.chimani.com/privacy.html.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very detailed, updates you about stuff happening on Yosemite on the fly
reviews.author: Keenan Hurley

reviews.comment: Great App for planning your National Park visit
reviews.author: Warren Austin

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Extremely helpful in helping me figure out what to do while there and where I was at any given time
reviews.author: chuck lemon

reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: mamun humayun

reviews.title: Must have for anyone going to yosemite
reviews.comment: This app has everything you need to know about what to do and where to go.
reviews.author: Brian Conlisk

reviews.comment: very helpful app in planning our excursions around Yosemite; enjoy the full-download content so use is available w/o network
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok until...
reviews.comment: It\'s bg downloads ate up 100MB of my data allowance in a day. I\'m not happy!
reviews.author: Andrew Ilott

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: DANNY ONTJES

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Norma Owens

reviews.title: Got better
reviews.comment: Recent update made it able to finally use the map without it crashing. But certain landmarks are off by icon or distance. But love to look at the map for my next venture. On galaxy note 10.1
reviews.author: David Perga

reviews.title: Chimini Park Yosemite
reviews.comment: Need a fair way to make reservations for all
reviews.author: Gary Mansell

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Comprehensive app that makes a trip to Yosemite that much better.
reviews.author: Steve Hansen

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Android version 2.3.4 says it requires airmail but the link does not find the product in the appstore. A search shows two airmail apps, by different vendors.now I have to download random clutter?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I would give it more stars if it wasn\'t missing the air mail and updated info.  Other than that I think this app has great potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Five Star Rating!
reviews.comment: I love Yosemite and wish I could get camping reservations more often!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lock up and close
reviews.comment: Seems like a good app but right from the beginning you have to accept Airmail for updates real time. No problem jut click cancel. The main problem with my Galaxy tab 10.1 is frequent lock ups and the program force closes.  Seems slow and quirky. Going to try for a while but if problems keep up will uninstall :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful, fun, needs an update!
reviews.comment: This app is wonderful, I\'m in Yosemite as we speak. My only problem is that some locations need an update. I read a few things that mentioned \"reopening in 2011\" and such, which makes me leery about things that also say \"closed for the season\". Otherwise, locations are spot on, descriptions are on point, etc. It\'s great to know where a bathroom is when you really need one, especially when you\'re a girl and the last thing you want to do is squat behind some boulder!!! :P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad for a travel app
reviews.comment: It seems that travel apps have a long way to go but this one is not to bad.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Chimani Yosemite
reviews.comment: I love the consistent program structure between parks. We have not had chance to use, but will next month.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app very informative for trips any time of year
reviews.author: A Google User
